title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately triggers package view refiltering
description: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately triggers package view refiltering
OB: The package view in the background refilters immediately when a working set is deleted.
EB: The package view should only refilter when the working set selection dialog is closed, not during working set manipulation. Additionally, pressing cancel should cancel any changes made to the working sets, including cancelling the remove action.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create a working set with one project and select it. This should cause the package view to be filtered.
2. Open the working set dialog again and create a second working set. Delete the first working set.
